content: HAC-V-T Top-of-slab anchor channel Serrated cast-in anchor channels in custom sizes and lengths for top-of-slab installations catering to 3D loads ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Cast-in anchor channels- - - ### FEATURES:Features Confinement of concrete edge allows for designs with higher load requirements Helps overcome many limits of concrete capacity or slab geometry Design with PROFIS Anchor Channel software â€“ an efficient and powerful planning tool based on the ESR-3520 compliance evaluation as well as AC232 and ACI 318 requirements Suitable for small edge distances and thin concrete slabs Available for various edge distances and pre-assembled for quicker installation Applications Installing curtain wall brackets in top-of-slab position with anchor channels Fastening to thin concrete slabs Seismic-relevant applications and 3D loads ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon Steel, Hot-Dip Galvanized Channel profile: HAC-V-T 50 EDGE, HAC-V-T 50 Lite PROFIS Software: Yes Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon Steel, Hot-Dip Galvanized | Channel profile | HAC-V-T 50 EDGE, HAC-V-T 50 Lite | PROFIS Software | Yes | Product type | Anchor channel ### ITEMS- 2366676 -
